title: Riot is this normal?
body:
Hi all

Just wanted to ask riot something:
So i crashed over 10 times in one game, all because of one msg: 'WELCOMETSUMMONRIFT'
The title was shown in red characters surrounded by black, it didn't scare me, it just made me wonder.
Anyway, I started to crash alot after that title, it pissed me off so badly!

Also another thing, the image I've shown, did anyone get that???
It was a bit weird to see that.

But good job Riot on the new HUD

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Zen Bot,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=adM625M4,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-23T08:10:51.387+0000)

> But good job Riot on the new HUD

New HUD is cancer.

> school mac

Well, there's your problem.

that's funny, but it's not sadly, it's pissing me off to brink point
My mac worked fine in the other patches, just something has to do with this one update that's fuking up my mac

Same here, mac too.
Could be worth escalating, i'm trying to reach someone at the moment. It's probably just a simple glitch, shouldn't take long to fix.
As for your crashes... Any of those realted to Miss Fortune? 'cause i think that's the only common link between mine.

> [{quoted}](name=Zen Bot,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=adM625M4,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-23T08:10:51.387+0000)
>
> Hi all
> 
> Just wanted to ask riot something:
> So i crashed over 10 times in one game, all because of one msg: 'WELCOMETSUMMONRIFT'
> The title was shown in red characters surrounded by black, it didn't scare me, it just made me wonder.
> Anyway, I started to crash alot after that title, it pissed me off so badly!
> 
> Also another thing, the image I've shown, did anyone get that???
> It was a bit weird to see that.
> 
> But good job Riot on the new HUD

Hi, I've seen this problem across the boards.
I think this is an issue with Mac's and the new update.
Hopefully it gets fixed soon!
P.S Anyone on Windows with Windows 8 after an update their computer froze then unfroze after a minute or 2?
